long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This game was born in Game Jam. If you liked the idea write a review and we will create several more levels.
A player is a nanorobot implanted in a person's body. You fight with bacteria and viruses in the human body.
The robot does not have engines, the control is carried out by shots (the ship pushes in the opposite direction)
Three people are playing, every 30 seconds there is a change in the rules (the type of weapon, the speed and direction of moving the weapon can change)
You have to adjust and coordinate your actions with your friends so that it is effective to fight off enemies, pick up boosts and maneuver in the direction of the boss)
Controls:
1 player - turn of arms - A / D , fire - space
2 player - turn of arms - Left arrow / Right arrow , fire - enter
or 
You can connect PS4 joysticks and play three !!!
